name: Systems & Integration Engineer
description:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Develop and design equipment layout/solutions based on clearly defined customer expectations, needs, project specifications and project scope.
  • Drive (in close collaboration with the BU sales team) preparation of quotations/offers (including value argumentation/financial analysis), negotiations, and closing of systems integration customer projects.
  • Select external partners, build the project team, coordinate the order and deliver the equipment solutions in line with project specifications, timing and budget.
  • Coordinate installation and training of customer equipment projects with the Service&Application Team.
  • Be the project leader for customer equipment projects and act as a 'general contractor' for holistic systems integration solutions for Sealed Air’s customers (including systems and solutions from multiple suppliers).
  • Assist in seeking and proposing a network of systems integration partners’ (sub-contractors’) in coordination with the Systems&Integration manager and CSC bases Equipment Functions teams.
  • Substantiate new Systems&Integration solutions introduction into the field.
  • Explore and support generating leads & opportunities on systems integration customer projects.
  • Be accountable for the financial conditions of each deal, be responsible for adhering to the SIR, PTF and C4C processes, and ensure the correct classification of income.
  • Accurately and timely report on equipment pipeline, forecast, OOH monthly highlights and success factor performance.
  • Provide customer feedback to a manager to adapt and optimize our equipment performance to the market needs.
  • Assure proper interfacing within the Organization and the best possible utilization of overall resources.
  • Provide professional support to the functional divisions within the area of S&I knowledge and competence, supporting seamless execution of commercial projects.
  • Main focus is on Equipment food and non-food Packaging Systems.
  • Support the selling of services to meet the Sealed Air’s financial objectives.
  • Implement and respect Sealed Air’s safety rules.

PURPOSE/MISSION

  • Selling Systems & Integration customer equipment projects and supporting the BU sales team on standalone equipment sales as well as simple lines.
  • Define, develop, promote, sell and deliver Packaging Solutions for Customers in a matrix environment in cooperation with local MEA Sales, Service&Application and Euro Experts & CSC bases Equipment Functions teams.

JOB REQUIREMENTS

Geographic responsibilities:

  • CIS, mainly Russia.

Qualification / Education:

  • Higher education.
  • Mechanical design qualification. Fundamental background on Draftsight, SolidWorks, AutoCAD Mechanical or Autodesk Inventor, computer proficiency, teamwork, and time management.
  • Shows an interest in data analytics, project management, mechanical design, engineering development processes.

Experience:

  • From graduate to solid engineering experience
  • Talented in technical aspects: machines, processes, materials etc.

Certification or specific training:

  • Obligatory: good command in auto cad 2d lay outs, electrical drawing and 3d modeling.
  • Prepared to be socialized and integrated in international SEE corporate team to work with international customer accounts.
  • Good command in spoken and written English.
  • Comfortable to travel 20-30% of working time.
